Title: Long in the Tooth
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Chris Provenzano, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Wendy Calhoun (executive story editor), Chris Provenzano (executive story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylan and the mob compete to capture a fugitive, 'Roland Pike,' racing to the Mexican border.
